RMIGameOfNim

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMIGameOfNim.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerControlledPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class used to hold the information relevant to them, such as their ID, their settings and if they are ready or in a match. Further this includes a list of messages that is being used as a queue by the server to tell send messages to the client GUI
